description: Unique identifier for the equipment make record; used as the primary key and to reference this make from other tables.
System-generated audit datetime for this record, stored as yyyymmddhhmmssmmm (milliseconds). Represents creation or last update; time zone unspecifiedâ€”confirm with SME.
Brand or manufacturer label associated with equipment records (make name); may include model variants in some cases.
Key from a legacy system used to cross-reference or migrate historical make records; may be null. Confirm with SME.
Name of the legacy source table where this record originated; supports data lineage during migration. Confirm with SME.
Full manufacturer name standardized for reporting; distinct from the make display value. Likely used for normalization; confirm with SME.
